title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 508.0 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 508.0 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part describes the Child/Teen Health Plan (C/THP), the eligibility criteria for providers and recipients of C/THP services, the
requirements of a C/THP examination and the responsibility of the C/THP
provider in fulfilling those requirements, and the reimbursement
provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
508.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
